t: Amazon.com : Cajun's Choice Fish Fry, Cajun Style, 8-Ounce (Pack of 8) : Gourmet Seasoned Coatings : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I’ve tried many, many other fish fry brands however, nothing beats the New Orleans Cajun fish fry seasoning! I love this fish fry! It’s light and fluffy and no pre-seasoning required - I normally coat with egg white first and dredge through the seasoning.

t: Cajun Chef Hot Sauce : Amazon.ca: Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I've tried them all and this is the best tasting Louisian hot sauce around. Unlike most hot sauces that taste too vinegary, Cajun Chef presents a wonderful pepper flavor with vinegar taking a backseat. The sauce is flavorful and the heat is very mild.
